item.description:
Title Change for this meetup event.

Save this date, Saturday January 23rd, and time, 2pm - 4:45pm, for the first of what could be a series to educate our members and then have first hand knowledge on the proposed and suggested topics to give to those we reach out to (for those of us who do not currently have the knowledge). If you do please come and share your knowledge of what is realistic for beginners, intermediates and beyond.

First meeting topic Everything You Need to Know About Firearms/Self Defense.

Would like these points discussed:
1. Which to purchase, what are the factors to determine this:
    a. Rifles vs Pistols
    b. 1 Manufacturer over another
    c. Within a. above which models
    d. Efficiency
    e. Cost
2. Purchase of - How, with whom, where
3. How many to purchase
4. Let's talk about ammo
5. Different types of ranges
6. Where these different ranges are
7. Types of handling training available
8. Group Lessons
    a. Need to know who is interested
    b. best group/individual to provide/lead training
    c. weekend vs mid-week
9. Intro to Committees of Safety (now on meetup)


Location North Haven Library, 17 Elm Street.
mapquest Link: http://www.mapquest.c...
$2/pp at the door.


The next topic will be Investing in Gold & Silver and State Depositories in February.

Here come the pleases:
Please send in your ideas for other meetings in this series, these two are all I have.

Please pass this along to other C4L meetups and other liberty grassroots groups who you genuinely believe will be interested.

PLEASE participate. The more who do, the more our strength grows, the more we learn.

Please RSVP on the meetup and send me a message if you want to be a speaker.

barbara g.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be In the Community Meeting Room in the front to start the meeting.
item.name: 2nd Amendment Firearms Safety Meeting
